bit.name: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse

int.name: Speed Table/Mid Range Cab Speed Step
int.description: See RP 9.2.2 for more information. Values from 2 to 127 indicate preloaded speed tables. 0 or 1 means not used. Values between 128 and 154 define the cab throttle position where the mid range decoder speed value is applied
